div.p: Well today is Sunday, and church is over, and I have nothing to do or any where to go, so I'll just set here and do what?

Hope you are getting use to be away from home and haveing a good time. Friday night some of the football team was in a wreck, some hurt bad was sent to Spartanburg, to a hospital one of the boys was Vincent Logan He is Ray's brother, they say he was the star player. Gina is home she is going back to school and is going to leave the baby with Gearl. I haven't seen them yet, she'll be here until Oct. 1
Johnie M. and me worked at a wedding last night. I thought I would dream dishes the rest of the night. I got tired. We worked from 6 to 10. I needed the money
A message from the chicken's come home we are hungry--haven't eaten since Friday. Come please.

Not much to write about here is $4.00 can you buy stamps there, if so can you get a book for four dollars, if not I'll try to send you some next week.
Work hard and learn everything you can.
I'm glad you are working that will keep some to keep from being homesick. Just keep bussey at somethings, even if you have to make up somethings to do.
My spelling is afull but I hope you can make out what I'm saying.

p.advice: Be good and work hard. I love you and so proud of you, because you are trying to make better your life so you won't have to wash dishes and make bed's and sweep nasty floors.
p.wish: I wish I could have did more with my life

postscript.p: The boys was from the high school in Spindale, haven't heard they're doing
